oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Rain believed to be ridden by sorcerers. By /han kass o (L VIII.
27. 8399 rev. and 8400 rev., note). |han kass'o was told by his elders that dead people (who come out of the ground) are those who 'rode the Rain' (when living) and thus do so again (they are rain
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dead people are those who rode the Rain
